week12.data

Class DataAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • week12.data.DataAccess

  • public class DataAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the interface to the datastore For this implementation that is a MySql database
    Author:
    scottl

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws AtmDataException
        Establishes the connection to the database. Loads the JDBC driver for MySQL user and password are hard coded. Not a best practice. Initializes all the prepared statements.
        Throws:
        AtmDataException
